New_Haven.Strouse, Adler Company Corset Factory:
The Strouse, Adler Company Corset Factory in New Haven, Connecticut is a historic building complex that was listed on the NRHP in 2002.
It was deemed significant as the headquarters and manufacturing plant of Strouse, Adler and Company, "a pioneer in the corset industry" when New Haven was regarded as "the corset capital of the world". Part of the building was built in 1876 and there were later additions.
